issue.title: [CF 642] request condition "targettarget = <some unit>"
issue.body:
My design is to have it tell me when I have tanking debuffs on whatever mob it is that I'm tanking.

The condition would check to see if TargetTarget=Player or maybe Focus or something like that.

This would allow a semi-universal meta to tell me when Weakened Armor is on my target (which my warrior will do as both Fury or Protection) and only tell me about Weakened Blows when I'm actively tanking a mob (as the weakened blows debuff is not apply-able as a DPS warrior)


> Posted by CurseForge user theondry | Imported from CurseForge issue #642 | Raw

comments.body:
Hrm. I just noticed DPS warriors can still apply Weakened Blows.

but... I still have reason to think my idea is good.


> Posted by CurseForge user theondry

Any reason why the Unit is Unit condition won't work for this?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

From what I can tell from your description, the Unit is Unit condition should work just fine for this situation.

As always, let me know if this will not solve your problem, or if you need any further help with this or any other issue.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
